item.title: My First Pattern File
item.description: You can just write markdown here. But don’t forget there are lots of shortcodes to help you with writing and showing off code too. See the documentation for Learner (site TBD) for full details. Here's an example of a note shortcode for adding little "oh and also" notes to your patterns' documentation.

item.title: The Name Of This Project/Site
item.description: This is your homepage. These are the contents of the index.md file, found in your content folder.
